cnd6:17.5: paṭipassaddhā → paṭippassaddhā (bj, s2, s3), sukhappaṭisaṃvedī → sukhapaṭisaṃvedī (bj, s1-3)
cnd6:17.6: poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ → pokhānupokhaṃ (s1-3), udakūmikajātaṃ → udakomikajātaṃ (bj), avīci santati sahitaṃ → avici saṃgisahitaṃ (s1) | avici samaṅgi sahitaṃ (s2, s3), phassitaṃ → phussitaṃ (bj) | phusitaṃ (s1-3)
